channel.title: Reborn System
channel.description:
Reborn is a system where once you reach 110 combat your player pays so much gp + pk points to become reborn;(5m, 100 pkpts in this vid) your player gets reset to level 3 with 15% stronger. Your player gets his/her own icon in front of there name also. Also, yes this does save if i were to logout/login.
[b]I am posting this because i'd like to see who would play a server with this system implemented, so leave feedback please![/b]
Thanks to xEnt for this idea (from rusty online).
-Divinity,
youtube video = http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TlPTVx1xFjQ

item.title: Reborn System
item.dc:creator: @KO9 KO9
item.description:
@KO9 wrote:

[quote=“degenerate, post:9, topic:294978”][quote author=xEnt link=topic=390078.msg2913119#msg2913119 date=1250221016]
yeah the idea was ripped from a game called Conquer Online. The idea was made because it gives you something to do, and more hours of gameplay to become the best
[/quote]

I’m guessing that’s where you got the “items composition” idea from, too? ;)[/quote]
Both ideas were originally used in Ragnarok Online ;p

Read full topic

Also, you forgot to implement wielded items validation when you changed your levels… You still worn your R2H at level 3.

WOAH!! You posted!

item.title: Reborn System
item.dc:creator: @Divinity Divinity
item.description:
@Divinity wrote:

[quote=“Old Rsc Player, post:5, topic:294978”]Divinity, I have something similar to reborn system.
I wont be giving you full details because im gonna be using it.
However the rewards are different. Instead of having like
15 percent stronger. Mine has like better npcs to talk to, better training spots
etc[/quote]

Yes well I’ve only coded that system in 30 minutes tops. I plan to go in much more depth with it.

Edit:

Also, you forgot to implement wielded items validation when you changed your levels… You still worn your R2H at level 3.

Thanks for that, actually did not notice that at all heh.

Read full topic

item.title: Reborn System
item.dc:creator: @maxmurks maxmurks
item.description:
@maxmurks wrote:

:eek: I think its a great idea. It’s different and would make the game have a completely new goal to achieve. If this was out i would definately play it. Tell me if you release a client for it.

item.title: Reborn System
item.dc:creator: @Peter Peeter
item.description:
@Peter wrote:

[quote=“Divinity, post:3, topic:294978”]yeah, i can’t use wamp etc on this pc. Either way, whats wrong with easyrsc besides its name?

Its not like it matters if someone uses EasyRSC or RSCD really, I hate all the forum mySql shit personally, and im sure a lot of people do, so don’t judge by that.[/quote]

As a startup, EasyRSC is fine. As a dedicated server, RSCD > EasyRSC.

item.title: Reborn System
item.dc:creator: @Divinity Divinity
item.description:
@Divinity wrote:

Reborn is a system where once you reach 110 combat
your player pays so much gp + pk points to become reborn;(5m, 100 pkpts in this vid)
your player gets reset to level 3 with 15% stronger.
Your player gets his/her own icon in front of there name also.
Also, yes this does save if i were to logout/login.

I am posting this because i’d like to see who would play a server with this system implemented, so leave feedback please!

Thanks to xEnt for this idea (from rusty online).

-Divinity,

youtube video = http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TlPTVx1xFjQ
